alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Iberia; Lafayette; Lower St. Martin; St. Landry; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 30 at 3:45AM CDT until March 30 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Avoyelles, Evangeline, St. Landry, Acadia, Vermilion, Upper St. Martin, Lafayette, St. Mary, Iberia and Lower St. Martin Parishes. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 11 AM this morning to 5 PM CDT this afternoon. For the Wind Advisory, until 11 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Iberia; Lafayette; Lower St. Martin; St. Landry; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion
